valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 18 Dec 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 19 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Developing Atlantic low moving very rapidly northeastwards, expected northeast coast of England 992 by 1800 Thursday

In southeast, mainly fair. In northwest, rain or showers.
